title: 1971년 United States v. John W. Shannon, Jr. Appeal of Theodore R. Whaley 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: United States v. John W. Shannon, Jr. Appeal of Theodore R. Whaley. 판결일: 1971-08-13. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: United States v. John W. Shannon, Jr. Appeal of Theodore R. Whaley
**판결일**: 1971-08-13
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

## 인용

- 445 F.2d 1401

## 판결문 요약

445 F.2d 1401
    UNITED STATES of Americav.John W. SHANNON, Jr., et al.Appeal of Theodore R. WHALEY, Appellant.
    No. 19208.
    United States Court of Appeals, Third Circuit.
    Argued August 4, 1971.
    Decided August 13, 1971.
    
      Appeal from the United States District Court for the District of New Jersey; Mitchell H. Cohen, Judge.
      William J. Cook, Brown, Connery, Kulp, Wille, Purnell & Greene, Camden, N. J., for appellant.
      D. William Subin, Asst. U. S. Atty., Camden, N. J. (Herbert J. Stern, U. S. Atty., Newark, N. J., on the brief), for appellees.
      Before SEITZ, Chief Judge, and KALODNER and GIBBONS, Circuit Judges.
      OPINION OF THE COURT
      PER CURIAM:
    
    
      1
      Appellant was convicted by a jury and sentenced for the offense of bank robbery, 18 U.S.C. § 2113(b). We find no reversible error.
    
    
      2
      The judgment of the district court will be affirmed.
    
    ...
